requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU with x86 or x64 architecture and SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX10+ capable gpu
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Any CPU with x64 architecture and SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL 3.2+ / Vulkan capable GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS versions are not supported.
